title: Conduct UX Review of Homepage
description: A UX specialist is tasked with reviewing the company homepage to identify potential areas of friction for users.

tasks.description: Perform a heuristic evaluation of the homepage against established usability principles (e.g., Nielsen's 10 heuristics).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent systematically reviews the page for common usability issues.

tasks.description: Review user session recordings or heatmaps to see how real users are interacting with the page.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies where users are getting stuck or failing to click.

tasks.description: Compile a report with 3-5 prioritized recommendations for improvement (e.g., 'Make the primary CTA button more prominent').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a report with actionable recommendations for A/B testing.
